meta.title: Lilith Froude | Founder, Crowd Ctrl
meta.description: Meet Lilith Froude, the AI-driven entrepreneur building Crowd Ctrl—a blockchain ticketing platform that restores value to artists, fans, and venues.

hero.name: Lilith Froude
hero.title: Founder & CEO, Crowd Ctrl | Secretary, Arizona Blockchain Council
hero.tagline: Control the ticket. Own the experience.

about.summary: Lilith Froude is a builder at heart—pairing an entrepreneurship degree with an MS in Artificial Intelligence to reinvent ticketing for artists, organizers, and fans.

origin_story.headline: From Algorand intern to Web3 founder.
origin_story.copy: Lilith’s internships at Algorand Foundation sparked her fascination with decentralized systems, inspiring her to create Crowd Ctrl after hearing the pain points of artists and concert-goers firsthand.

inflection_point.headline: Pitching at BitAngels and ETHPhoenix.
inflection_point.copy: Presenting Crowd Ctrl at the BitAngels pitchfest during ETHPhoenix validated the vision: Arizona is ready for ticketing that blends policy alignment, community engagement, and Web3 transparency.

mission.headline: Empower artists, organizers, and fans with transparent, equitable ticketing.

pillars.title: Artist Autonomy
pillars.description: Deliver faster settlements and higher margins for independent artists and venues.

pillars.title: Fair Access
pillars.description: Eliminate scalper arbitrage and junk fees with blockchain-enforced ticket logic.

pillars.title: Immersive Experience
pillars.description: Blend interactive 3D storytelling and AI with every event touchpoint.

project.name: Crowd Ctrl
project.problem: Ticketmaster and Live Nation dominate venues, inflating fees for fans, delaying payouts for artists, and locking organizers into restrictive contracts.
project.solution: Crowd Ctrl is a blockchain-powered ticketing platform that minimizes fees, deters scalping, and accelerates post-show settlements while giving fans ownership-grade experiences.
value_proposition: Keep ticket fees low and route more revenue directly to artists and organizers.
Leverage smart contracts to enforce resale rules and reduce scalper impact.
Deliver payments to artists faster through on-chain settlement rails.
Offer interactive fan experiences—from NFT collectibles to immersive site design.

experience.headline: Ticketing reimagined for the digital-native fan.
copy: Interactive 3D hero experiences welcome fans before the first scroll.
Pixel-perfect, glitch-inspired aesthetics amplify brand storytelling.
Live audio visualizers, hidden easter eggs, and Web3 collectibles reward community loyalty.

features: Blockchain ticket issuance and resale governance
On-chain settlement with escrow and instant payouts
Immersive front-end built with Lovable and MailerLite API integrations
Analytics dashboards for organizers and artists

traction.community_validation: Presented at BitAngels Pitchfest and ETHPhoenix; steward for ETHPhoenix hackathon and AI Film 3 Culture Jam.
traction.partnerships: Collaborating with Arizona Blockchain Council, local venues, and independent artists to pilot Crowd Ctrl events.

highlights: Entrepreneurship graduate pursuing an MS in Artificial Intelligence at Arizona State University.
Secretary of the Arizona Blockchain Council, liaising with policymakers, universities, and industry leaders.
Built Crowd Ctrl’s immersive website featuring interactive 3D, audio-reactive visuals, and API-powered community integrations.
Chooses policy alignment, community engagement, and product value over competing directly with incumbents.
Balances music roots (trumpet, trombone, steel pan) with blockchain engineering sensibilities.

quotes.speaker: Lilith Froude
quotes.text: Crowd Ctrl is a ticketing company using blockchain technology to enhance the consumer experience and organize the organizer’s experience.

quotes.speaker: Lilith Froude
quotes.text: Fans hate the fees and scalpers—artists hate waiting weeks to get paid. We can fix both sides with the right tech.

quotes.speaker: Lilith Froude
quotes.text: Ticketmaster has a monopoly, but numbers don’t lie. They only own a fraction of the market—we focus on delivering better value.

quotes.speaker: Lilith Froude
quotes.text: Aligning with policy and building community is the recipe that will change people’s lives.

timeline.event: Intered at Algorand Foundation, sparking the idea for blockchain-powered ticketing.
Founded Crowd Ctrl after researching pain points with artists, venues, and fans.
Accepted as Secretary of the Arizona Blockchain Council to drive education and policy alignment.
Presented Crowd Ctrl at BitAngels Pitchfest during ETHPhoenix; joined AI Film 3 as a steward.
Building immersive Crowd Ctrl platform with Lovable and launching creator beta pilots.

supporters.name: AI Film 3 / ETHPhoenix
supporters.highlight: Provides stage time, hackathon stewardship, and cross-pollination with film and AI creators.

supporters.name: Arizona Blockchain Council
supporters.highlight: Supports education and regulatory alignment for blockchain innovation statewide.

supporters.name: Independent Artists & Venues
supporters.highlight: Co-design ticketing flows that prioritize fair fees, anti-scalping, and faster payouts.
